When does City Council Meet?
----------------------------

Regular Meetings - first and third Tuesday of each month.

Unless otherwise
noted on the agenda
, all meetings are held at City Hall at 5:30 p.m.

Sugar Land City Hall
Council Chamber
2700 Town Center Blvd. N
Sugar Land, TX 77479

Request for Mayor and/or City Council Appearance or Participation
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Individuals and organizations wishing to invite the Mayor or City Council Members to attend or participate in an event or function are required to submit the online request form.

*Please note that requests must be submitted two weeks in advance to allow adequate time for Council support staff to process the request. The availability of elected officials is not guaranteed.*

To request a proclamation, recognition certificate, or letter from the Mayor or City Council, fill out the
online request form
.
